childhood: Your childhood was calm and protected.
When you were young, you studied in a faraway land. (Linguistics, Socialize, Lore)
As a child, you were nearly killed by #assassin#.
You spent much of your childhood in bed, suffering from a vile illness.
Showing early talent, you studied with Immaculates even as a child. (Martial Arts, Lore, Socialize)
Young though you were, an occultist took you under his wing. (Occult, Lore, Linguistics)
Growing up, you proved your worth at a military academy. (Melee, Archery, Thrown, War)
A cruel turn of fate saw you lost in the wilderness as a child, only to return after many years had passed. (Survival, Resistance, Archery)
You, though, took to the street as a runaway. (Survival, Larceny, Athletics)
A child of beauty and wits, a #supernaturalCreature# adopted you as his Favorite. (Merits befitting your patron)
